metadata.description:
💧 GenaDrop is the ultimate no code NFT multichain minter + marketplace.

- Mint NFTs across different EVM chains like Avalanche, Aurora, Arbitrum, Polygon, Celo, and even NEAR
- Generate NFTs with AI
- Check out the feed on NEAR Social and mint posts to authors as NFTs
- Explore NFTs with our mlutichain explorer built on the graph
metadata.name: GenaDrop App
